about_the_game:
The Starter Launch Pack includes:

  • brand new ship stickers Yee Haw! and Space Baby
  • 10x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 7 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards
  • 300 Space Credits, which can be used to purchase other premium items

Content of the Starter Launch Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.
detailed_description:
The Starter Launch Pack includes:

  • brand new ship stickers Yee Haw! and Space Baby
  • 10x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 7 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards
  • 300 Space Credits, which can be used to purchase other premium items

Content of the Starter Launch Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Galactic Junk League - Starter Launch Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 and better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Starter Launch Pack DLC for Galactic Junk League with 2 brand new ship stickers for higher level of customization, 10 Space Whisky and 7 days of Pilot License to double your XP rewards
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support
